name: No way back
description:
Play through 4 incredible levels that change the way you play the game from topdown style RPG controls to platformer physics to anti-gravity path puzzles! 

Controls:

[arrows] / [WASD] / Gamepad joystick / Gamepad dPad - Movement

[space] / (a) button - Jump

Awards:

This game won 4th place in GMC's 34th jam as well as 'best concept'!
